video_title: 411 on Mason McTavish - Draft Pro Hockey

transcript.text: [Music]
nhl teams looking for a versatile
big-bodied center who can score
at will will have their eyes fixed on
peterborough pete's mason mctavish
a big powerful center that can produce
offense at an elite level
he is one of the top centers available
in the draft and has the ability to play
on the wing if need be
mctavish lacks the wheels others in this
draft have but remains a solid skater
that can carry the puck in transition
and attack with pressure
once in the offensive zone mason is able
to break down defenders and find open
ice
he drifts to find his shooting lanes
really well and is a one-timer threat
from all over the ice
mctavish can score from distance or in
tight and has a very heavy release
he tore up the ohl last season and after
a few quiet games
he has been on a tear with ehc olton
early this season mctavish also has this
nifty tendency to score in bunches 22 of
his 29 goals last season were part of
multi-goal efforts while 7 of the 11 he
had in europe
came via the same medium mctavish is
powerful and responsible all
over the ice his most nhl ready trait is
his iq
and wicked shot release last night in
that loss
slides it over
[Music]
regional scout matt morrison scanned in
on a handful of mctavish's swiss games
and praised his ability
to adapt quickly and effectively in each
aspect of his game
importing his 200-foot game to olton and
delivering an early preview of what's to
come
for swiss nhl followers nhl teams will
want to add this potential top 6 power
center to their stable
sooner rather than later come draft
night thanks for watching

full_text: [Music] nhl teams looking for a versatile big-bodied center who can score at will will have their eyes fixed on peterborough pete's mason mctavish a big powerful center that can produce offense at an elite level he is one of the top centers available in the draft and has the ability to play on the wing if need be mctavish lacks the wheels others in this draft have but remains a solid skater that can carry the puck in transition and attack with pressure once in the offensive zone mason is able to break down defenders and find open ice he drifts to find his shooting lanes really well and is a one-timer threat from all over the ice mctavish can score from distance or in tight and has a very heavy release he tore up the ohl last season and after a few quiet games he has been on a tear with ehc olton early this season mctavish also has this nifty tendency to score in bunches 22 of his 29 goals last season were part of multi-goal efforts while 7 of the 11 he had in europe came via the same medium mctavish is powerful and responsible all over the ice his most nhl ready trait is his iq and wicked shot release last night in that loss slides it over [Music] regional scout matt morrison scanned in on a handful of mctavish's swiss games and praised his ability to adapt quickly and effectively in each aspect of his game importing his 200-foot game to olton and delivering an early preview of what's to come for swiss nhl followers nhl teams will want to add this potential top 6 power center to their stable sooner rather than later come draft night thanks for watching
